sn22.65:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.65:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena …pe… pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.65:2.1: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi”ti?
sn22.65:2.9: Imassa khvaham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami”ti.
sn22.65:3.2: Sadhu kho tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi.
sn22.65:3.3: Rupam kho, bhikkhu, abhinandamano baddho marassa;
sn22.65:3.10: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attho datthabbo”ti …pe…
sn22.65:3.11: annataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahatam ahositi.
